info.title: WoRMS REST webservice
info.description: The definitions and operations are listed below. Click on an operation name to view it's details, and test it.

get.summary: Get the direct children (max. 50) for a given AphiaID
get.description: Get the direct children (max. 50) for a given AphiaID

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Starting recordnumber, when retrieving next chunk of (50) records. Default=1

get.summary: Get the complete classification for one taxon. This also includes any sub or super ranks.
get.description: Get the complete classification for one taxon. This also includes any sub or super ranks.

get.summary: Get all distributions for a given AphiaID
get.description: Get all distributions for a given AphiaID

get.summary: Get any external identifier(s) for a given AphiaID
get.description: Get any external identifier(s) for a given AphiaID

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Type of external identifier to return. The type should be one of the following values:
  • algaebase: Algaebase species ID
  • bold: Barcode of Life Database (BOLD) TaxID
  • dyntaxa: Dyntaxa ID
  • fishbase: FishBase species ID
  • iucn: IUCN Red List Identifier
  • lsid: Life Science Identifier
  • ncbi: NCBI Taxonomy ID (Genbank)
  • tsn: ITIS Taxonomic Serial Number
  • gisd: Global Invasive Species Database

get.summary: Get the AphiaID for a given name.
get.description:
Get the AphiaID for a given name.

Output: NULL when no match is found; -999 when multiple matches are found; an integer (AphiaID) when one exact match was found

206.description: No content due to multiple results

get.summary: Get the name for a given AphiaID
get.description: Get the name for a given AphiaID

get.summary: Get the complete AphiaRecord for a given AphiaID
get.description: Get the complete AphiaRecord for a given AphiaID

get.summary: Get an AphiaRecord for multiple AphiaIDs in one go (max: 50)
get.description: Get an AphiaRecord for multiple AphiaIDs in one go (max: 50)

get.summary: Get the Aphia Record for a given external identifier
get.description: Get the Aphia Record for a given external identifier

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: The external identifier to search for

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Type of external identifier to search for. The type should be one of the following values:
  • algaebase: Algaebase species ID
  • bold: Barcode of Life Database (BOLD) TaxID
  • dyntaxa: Dyntaxa ID
  • fishbase: FishBase species ID
  • iucn: IUCN Red List Identifier
  • lsid: Life Science Identifier
  • ncbi: NCBI Taxonomy ID (Genbank)
  • tsn: ITIS Taxonomic Serial Number
  • gisd: Global Invasive Species Database

get.summary: Lists all AphiaRecords (taxa) that have their last edit action (modified or added) during the specified period
get.description: Lists all AphiaRecords (taxa) that have their last edit action (modified or added) during the specified period

parameters.name: startdate
parameters.description: ISO 8601 formatted start date(time). Default=today(). i.e. 2022-02-02T01:21:53+00:00

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Starting recordnumber, when retrieving next chunk of (50) records. Default=1

get.summary: Try to find AphiaRecords using the TAXAMATCH fuzzy matching algorithm by Tony Rees
get.description:
For each given scientific name (may include authority), try to find one or more AphiaRecords, using the TAXAMATCH fuzzy matching algorithm by Tony Rees.
This allows you to (fuzzy) match multiple names in one call. Limited to 50 names at once for performance reasons

get.summary: Get one or more matching (max. 50) AphiaRecords for a given name
get.description: Get one or more matching (max. 50) AphiaRecords for a given name

parameters.name: like
parameters.description: Add a '%'-sign added after the ScientificName (SQL LIKE function). Default=true

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Starting recordnumber, when retrieving next chunk of (50) records. Default=1

get.summary: For each given scientific name, try to find one or more AphiaRecords
get.description: For each given scientific name, try to find one or more AphiaRecords. This allows you to match multiple names in one call. Limited to 500 names at once for performance reasons.

parameters.name: like
parameters.description: Add a '%'-sign after the ScientificName (SQL LIKE function). Default=false

get.summary: Get one or more Aphia Records (max. 50) for a given vernacular
get.description: Get one or more Aphia Records (max. 50) for a given vernacular

parameters.name: Vernacular
parameters.description: The vernacular to find records for

parameters.name: like
parameters.description: Add a '%'-sign before and after the input (SQL LIKE '%vernacular%' function). Default=false

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Starting recordnumber, when retrieving next chunk of (50) records. Default=1

get.summary: Get all synonyms for a given AphiaID
get.description: Get all synonyms for a given AphiaID

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Starting recordnumber, when retrieving next chunk of (50) records. Default=1

get.summary: Get all vernaculars for a given AphiaID
get.description: Get all vernaculars for a given AphiaID

get.summary: Get one or more sources/references including links, for one AphiaID
get.description: Get one or more sources/references including links, for one AphiaID

get.summary: Get taxonomic ranks by their identifier
get.description: Get taxonomic ranks by their identifier

get.summary: Get taxonomic ranks by their name
get.description: Get taxonomic ranks by their name

get.summary: Get the AphiaRecords for a given taxonRankID (max 50)
get.description: Get the AphiaRecords for a given taxonRankID (max 50)

parameters.name: belongsTo
parameters.description: Limit the results to descendants of the given AphiaID

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Starting recordnumber, when retrieving next chunk of (50) records. Default=1

get.summary: Get attribute definitions
get.description: Get attribute definitions. To refer to root items specify ID = '0'

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: The attribute definition id to search for

parameters.name: include_children
parameters.description: Include the tree of children. Default=true

get.summary: Get list values that are grouped by an CateogryID
get.description: Get list values that are grouped by an CateogryID

get.summary: Get a list of AphiaIDs (max 50) with attribute tree for a given attribute definition ID
get.description: Get a list of AphiaIDs (max 50) with attribute tree for a given attribute definition ID

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: The attribute definition id to search for

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Starting recordnumber, when retrieving next chunk of (50) records. Default=1

get.summary: Get a list of attributes for a given AphiaID
get.description: Get a list of attributes for a given AphiaID

parameters.name: include_inherited
parameters.description: Include attributes inherited from the taxon its parent(s). Default=false

AphiaID.description: Unique and persistent identifier within WoRMS. Primary key in the database --

scientificname.description: the full scientific name without authorship

authority.description: the authorship information for the scientificname formatted according to the conventions of the applicable nomenclaturalCode

taxonRankID.description: the taxonomic rank identifier of the most specific name in the scientificname

rank.description: the taxonomic rank of the most specific name in the scientificname

status.description: the status of the use of the scientificname (usually a taxonomic opinion). Additional technical statuses are (1) <u>quarantined</u>: hidden from public interface after decision from an editor and (2) <u>deleted</u>: AphiaID should NOT be used anymore, please replace it by the valid_AphiaID

unacceptreason.description: the reason why a scientificname is unaccepted

valid_AphiaID.description: the AphiaID (for the scientificname) of the currently accepted taxon. NULL if there is no currently accepted taxon.

valid_name.description: the scientificname of the currently accepted taxon

valid_authority.description: the authorship information for the scientificname of the currently accepted taxon

parentNameUsageID.description: the AphiaID (for the scientificname) of the direct, most proximate higher-rank parent taxon (in a classification)

kingdom.description: the full scientific name of the kingdom in which the taxon is classified

phylum.description: the full scientific name of the phylum or division in which the taxon is classified

class.description: the full scientific name of the class in which the taxon is classified

order.description: the full scientific name of the order in which the taxon is classified

family.description: the full scientific name of the family in which the taxon is classified

genus.description: the full scientific name of the genus in which the taxon is classified

citation.description: a bibliographic reference for the resource as a statement indicating how this record should be cited (attributed) when used

lsid.description: LifeScience Identifier. Persistent GUID for an AphiaID

isMarine.description: a boolean flag indicating whether the taxon is a marine organism, i.e. can be found in/above sea water. Possible values: 0/1/NULL

isBrackish.description: a boolean flag indicating whether the taxon occurrs in brackish habitats. Possible values: 0/1/NULL

isFreshwater.description: a boolean flag indicating whether the taxon occurrs in freshwater habitats, i.e. can be found in/above rivers or lakes. Possible values: 0/1/NULL

isTerrestrial.description: a boolean flag indicating the taxon is a terrestial organism, i.e. occurrs on land as opposed to the sea. Possible values: 0/1/NULL

isExtinct.description: a flag indicating an extinct organism. Possible values: 0/1/NULL

match_type.description: Type of match. Possible values: exact/like/phonetic/near_1/near_2

modified.description: The most recent date-time in GMT on which the resource was changed

locality.description: The specific description of the place

locationID.description: An identifier for the locality. Using the Marine Regions Geographic IDentifier (MRGID), see https://www.marineregions.org/mrgid.php

higherGeography.description: A geographic name less specific than the information captured in the locality term. Possible values: an IHO Sea Area or Nation, derived from the MarineRegions gazetteer

higherGeographyID.description: An identifier for the geographic region within which the locality occurred, using MRGID

recordStatus.description: The status of the distribution record. Possible values are 'valid' ,'doubtful' or 'inaccurate'. See here for explanation of the statuses

typeStatus.description: The type status of the distribution. Possible values: 'holotype' or empty.

establishmentMeans.description: The process by which the biological individual(s) represented in the Occurrence became established at the location. Possible values: values listed as Origin in WRiMS

decimalLatitude.description: The geographic latitude (in decimal degrees, WGS84)

decimalLongitude.description: The geographic longitude (in decimal degrees, WGS84)

qualityStatus.description: Quality status of the record. Possible values: 'checked', 'trusted' or 'unreviewed'. See https://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=manual#topic22

source_id.description: Unique identifier for the source within WoRMS --

use.description: Usage of the source for this taxon. See here for all values

page.description: Page(s) where the taxon is mentioned

url.description: Direct link to the source record

link.description: External link (i.e. journal, data system, etc..)

measurementTypeID.description: An internal identifier for the measurementType

measurementType.description: The nature of the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion https://www.marinespecies.org/traits/wiki

input_id.description: The data type that is expected as value for this attribute definition

CategoryID.description: The category identifier to list possible attribute values for this attribute definition

children.description: The possible child attribute keys that help to describe to current attribute

measurementTypeID.description: An internal identifier for the measurementType

measurementType.description: The nature of the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion https://www.marinespecies.org/traits/wiki

possibleAttributeValues.description: The category definition that list possible attribute values for this attribute definition

children.description: The possible child attribute keys that help to describe to current attribute

measurementValueID.description: An identifier for facts stored in the column measurementValue

measurementValue.description: The value of the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion

measurementValueCode.description: Additional info/code that helps to the describe/define the measurementValue

children.description: Child measurementValues that are more specific

AphiaID.description: Unique and persistent identifier within WoRMS

measurementValue.description: The value of the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion

source_id.description: The identifier for the AphiaSource for this attribute

reference.description: The AphiaSource reference for this attribute

qualitystatus.description: Quality status of the record. Possible values: 'checked', 'trusted' or 'unreviewed'. See https://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=manual#topic22

CategoryID.description: The category identifier to list possible attribute values for this attribute definition

AphiaID_Inherited.description: The AphiaID from where this attribute is inherited

children.description: The possible child attributes that help to describe to current attribute

AphiaID.description: Unique and persistent identifier within WoRMS. Primary key in the database

kingdom.description: The name of a taxonomic kingdom the rank is used in
